page.title: 13THE M6 MOTORWAY _ PART III
page.content: At Low Hurst,near the Golden Fleece interchange,there is a maintenance depot for the M6 motorway.From here many and varied tasks are regularly performed to keep the motorway in tip_top condition and,therefore,safe. Drains have to be kept clean and clear of obstructions,bridges have to be systematically inspected,electrical equipment illuminating the motorway signs needs checking,cat's eyes must also be looked at and the flashing warning signals must be kept operational at all times.The biggest problems occur in winter when ice and snow appear.The 6 men employed here have to be smart and get the salt down BEFORE the ice forms.Clearing snow is also a problem and this depot has a gritter_cum_snow_plough capable of carrying 11.5 tons of salt and moving at over 30mph.
